Build ID: 20111105040225

Steps to reproduce:

Just installed nightly.


Actual results:

A strange shape as showed on the picture appears on the top of the scrollbar.
When I hover on it, it moves really fast from right to left.

comments.text: What is the UX button on the left? Is this some experimental build, not normal nightly?
comments.author: acelists@atlas.sk
comments.raw_text: What is the UX button on the left? Is this some experimental build, not normal nightly?

comments.text: It's just a Nightly version where firefox developers test new ideas about visual improvements. I tried this on Nightly also, but it's still there.
